entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
